overview: La Apuesta is a Costa Rican film for television, directed and produced by Miguel Salguero, from 1968. In this 16 mm feature film, the journalist Miguel Salguero portrays the adventures of a group of people who make a bet and undertake a risky trip by land to Puerto Lim√≥n, crossing mighty rivers and wild nature, at a time when there was no road to the Caribbean port.
title: La Apuesta
